game - Static variable in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GuessGameLauncher
 
GameEngine - Class in com.lxisoft.battle.game.app
The Game Engine class provides all the services for running the Dot.Com guessing game.
GameEngine(int, int) - Constructor for class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Constructor for GameEngine Class

The constructor initializes the game engine object using the board size and player count provided.
getDirection() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
returns the direction value for the current DotCom instance
getDotComId() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
returns the ID of the current DotCom instance
getGuess() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
returns the guess stored by the current Player instance
getGuessCol(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Identifies the current column index position from player guess

The method selects the substring of player guess denoting the column index and parses the value into an integer using Integer.parseInt(String) method.
getGuessRow(String) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Identifies the current row index position from player guess

The method selects the substring of player guess denoting the row index and identifies the corresponding integer position value using the GameEngine.boardPositions array as reference.
getName() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
returns the name of the DotCom instance
getName() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
returns the name of the current Player instance
getScore() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
returns the current score of the Player instance
getUserName() - Method in class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.DotCom
returns the name of the player who has selected the current DotCom instance
GuessGameLauncher - Class in com.lxisoft.battle.game.app
Main class of the Guessing Game [Battleship Edition]
The main game loop is executed by this class.
GuessGameLauncher() - Constructor for class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GuessGameLauncher
